customer_name: WALLABY TALES LLC EYES OF THE WILD
site_name: WALLABY TALES LLC EYES OF THE WILD

citations.narrative:
During this inspection, it was noted that due to three new acquisitions and the births of Octodon degus, the maximum
number of animals, for this 3 year licensure, has risen above 100. According to the application the total number of
animals was 74. The application should have indicated the anticipated number of animals that were to be owned, held,
maintained or exhibited during the three year period of licensure. The license must obtain a new license before any
change resulting in more than the authorized number of animals on hand at any single point in time during the period of
licensure.
Licenses authorize increments of 50 animals on hand at any single point in time during the period of licensure. A licensee
must obtain a new license before any change resulting in more than the authorized number of animals on hand at any
single point in time during the period of licensure.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: JUNE 18, 2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(i) 
   
Requirements and application 
During this inspection, it was noted that due to three new acquisitions and the births of Octodon degus, the maximum 
number of animals, for this 3 year licensure, has risen above 100.  According to the application the total number of 
animals was 74.  The application should have indicated the anticipated number of animals that were to be owned, held, 
maintained or exhibited during the three year period of licensure.  The license must obtain a new license before any 
change resulting in more than the authorized number of animals on hand at any single point in time during the period of 
licensure. 
 
Licenses authorize increments of 50 animals on hand at any single point in time during the period of licensure. A licensee 
must obtain a new license before any change resulting in more than the authorized number of animals on hand at any 
single point in time during the period of licensure. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  JUNE 18, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative.

n
